channel.title: Blog
channel.description: Welcome to the blog! I’ll write some stuff in here. Also, even though you can't comment on these posts, feel free to message me about them.

item.title: Where I’ve been
item.description: This is a short update for all those who were wondering. Which is no one.

item.title: How I made this website
item.description: In this blog post, I’ll be talking about the making of this website, the resources which helped me, and stuff I’ll do in the future. This is my first blog post so I have no idea what I’m doing. Wish me luck!
